trans-unit.source: What's a Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app?
trans-unit.target: What's a Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app?

trans-unit.source: Learn about the different types of apps that we call Universal Windows apps--Windows Store apps, Windows Phone Store apps, and Windows Runtime apps.
trans-unit.target: Learn about the different types of apps that we call Universal Windows apps--Windows Store apps, Windows Phone Store apps, and Windows Runtime apps.

trans-unit.source: What's a Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app?
trans-unit.target: What's a Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app?

trans-unit.source: A Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app is a Windows experience that is built upon the Universal Windows Platform (UWP), which was first introduced in Windows 8 as the Windows Runtime.
trans-unit.target: A Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app is a Windows experience that is built upon the Universal Windows Platform (UWP), which was first introduced in Windows 8 as the Windows Runtime.

trans-unit.source: At the core of UWP apps is the idea that users want their *experiences* to be mobile across ALL their devices, and they want to use whatever device is most convenient or productive for the task at hand.
trans-unit.target: At the core of UWP apps is the idea that users want their *experiences* to be mobile across ALL their devices, and they want to use whatever device is most convenient or productive for the task at hand.

trans-unit.source: Windows 10 makes it easier to develop apps for the UWP with just one API set, one app package, and one store to reach all Windows 10 devices – PC, tablet, phone and more.
trans-unit.target: Windows 10 makes it easier to develop apps for the UWP with just one API set, one app package, and one store to reach all Windows 10 devices – PC, tablet, phone and more.

trans-unit.source: It’s easier to support a number of screen sizes, and also a variety of interaction models, whether it be touch, mouse & keyboard, a game controller, or a pen.
trans-unit.target: It’s easier to support a number of screen sizes, and also a variety of interaction models, whether it be touch, mouse & keyboard, a game controller, or a pen.

trans-unit.source: Windows-powered devices
trans-unit.target: Windows-powered devices

trans-unit.source: So, what's a UWP app?
trans-unit.target: So, what's a UWP app?

trans-unit.source: What makes a UWP app special?
trans-unit.target: What makes a UWP app special?

trans-unit.source: Here are some of the characteristics that make UWP apps on Windows 10 different.
trans-unit.target: Here are some of the characteristics that make UWP apps on Windows 10 different.

trans-unit.source: You target device families, not an OS.
trans-unit.target: You target device families, not an OS.

trans-unit.source: A device family identifies the APIs, system characteristics, and behaviors that you can expect across devices within the device family.
trans-unit.target: A device family identifies the APIs, system characteristics, and behaviors that you can expect across devices within the device family.

trans-unit.source: It also determines the set of devices on which your app can be installed from the store.
trans-unit.target: It also determines the set of devices on which your app can be installed from the store.

trans-unit.source: Apps are packaged and distributed using the .AppX packaging format.
trans-unit.target: Apps are packaged and distributed using the .AppX packaging format.

trans-unit.source: All UWP apps are distributed as an AppX package.
trans-unit.target: All UWP apps are distributed as an AppX package.

trans-unit.source: This provides a trustworthy installation mechanism and ensures that your apps can be deployed and updated seamlessly.
trans-unit.target: This provides a trustworthy installation mechanism and ensures that your apps can be deployed and updated seamlessly.

trans-unit.source: There's one store for all devices.
trans-unit.target: There's one store for all devices.

trans-unit.source: After you register as an app developer, you can submit your app to the store and make it available on all device families, or only those you choose.
trans-unit.target: After you register as an app developer, you can submit your app to the store and make it available on all device families, or only those you choose.

trans-unit.source: You submit and manage all your apps for Windows devices in one place.
trans-unit.target: You submit and manage all your apps for Windows devices in one place.

trans-unit.source: There's a common API surface across device families.
trans-unit.target: There's a common API surface across device families.

trans-unit.source: The Universal Windows Platform (UWP) core APIs are the same for all Windows device families.
trans-unit.target: The Universal Windows Platform (UWP) core APIs are the same for all Windows device families.

trans-unit.source: If your app uses only the core APIs, it will run on any Windows 10 device.
trans-unit.target: If your app uses only the core APIs, it will run on any Windows 10 device.

trans-unit.source: Extension SDKs make your app light up on specialized devices.
trans-unit.target: Extension SDKs make your app light up on specialized devices.

trans-unit.source: Extension SDKs add specialized APIs for each device family.
trans-unit.target: Extension SDKs add specialized APIs for each device family.

trans-unit.source: If your app is intended for a particular device family, you can make it light up by using these APIs.
trans-unit.target: If your app is intended for a particular device family, you can make it light up by using these APIs.

trans-unit.source: You can still have one app package that runs on all devices by checking what device family your app is running on before calling an extension API.
trans-unit.target: You can still have one app package that runs on all devices by checking what device family your app is running on before calling an extension API.

trans-unit.source: Adaptive Controls and input
trans-unit.target: Adaptive Controls and input

trans-unit.source: UI elements use *effective pixels* (see [Responsive design 101 for UWP apps](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn958435)), so they automatically adapt themselves based on the number of screen pixels available on the device.
trans-unit.target: UI elements use *effective pixels* (see [Responsive design 101 for UWP apps](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn958435)), so they automatically adapt themselves based on the number of screen pixels available on the device.

trans-unit.source: And they work well with multiple types of input such as keyboard, mouse, touch, pen, and Xbox One controllers.
trans-unit.target: And they work well with multiple types of input such as keyboard, mouse, touch, pen, and Xbox One controllers.

trans-unit.source: If you need to further tailor your UI to a specific screen size or device, new layout panels and tooling help you adapt your UI to the devices your app may run on.
trans-unit.target: If you need to further tailor your UI to a specific screen size or device, new layout panels and tooling help you adapt your UI to the devices your app may run on.

trans-unit.source: For a more detailed look at the UWP, see [Guide to Universal Windows Platform apps](universal-application-platform-guide.md).
trans-unit.target: For a more detailed look at the UWP, see [Guide to Universal Windows Platform apps](universal-application-platform-guide.md).

trans-unit.source: Use a language you already know
trans-unit.target: Use a language you already know

trans-unit.source: You can create UWP apps using the programming languages you're most familiar with, like C# or Visual Basic with XAML, JavaScript with HTML, or C++ with DirectX and/or Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML).
trans-unit.target: You can create UWP apps using the programming languages you're most familiar with, like C# or Visual Basic with XAML, JavaScript with HTML, or C++ with DirectX and/or Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML).

trans-unit.source: You can even write components in one language and use them in an app that's written in another language.
trans-unit.target: You can even write components in one language and use them in an app that's written in another language.

trans-unit.source: UWP apps use the Windows Runtime, a native API built into the operating system.
trans-unit.target: UWP apps use the Windows Runtime, a native API built into the operating system.

trans-unit.source: This API is implemented in C++ and supported in C#, Visual Basic, C++, and JavaScript in a way that feels natural for each language.
trans-unit.target: This API is implemented in C++ and supported in C#, Visual Basic, C++, and JavaScript in a way that feels natural for each language.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Visual Studio 2015 provides a UWP app template for each language that lets you create a single project for all devices.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Visual Studio 2015 provides a UWP app template for each language that lets you create a single project for all devices.

trans-unit.source: When your work is finished, you can produce an app package and submit it to the Windows Store from within Visual Studio to get your app out to customers on any Windows 10 device.
trans-unit.target: When your work is finished, you can produce an app package and submit it to the Windows Store from within Visual Studio to get your app out to customers on any Windows 10 device.

trans-unit.source: UWP apps come to life on Windows
trans-unit.target: UWP apps come to life on Windows

trans-unit.source: On Windows, your app can deliver relevant, real-time info to your users and keep them coming back for more.
trans-unit.target: On Windows, your app can deliver relevant, real-time info to your users and keep them coming back for more.

trans-unit.source: In the modern app economy, your app has to be engaging to stay at the front of your users’ lives.
trans-unit.target: In the modern app economy, your app has to be engaging to stay at the front of your users’ lives.

trans-unit.source: Windows provides you with lots of resources to help keep your users returning to your app:
trans-unit.target: Windows provides you with lots of resources to help keep your users returning to your app:

trans-unit.source: Live tiles and the lock screen show contextually relevant and timely info at a glance.
trans-unit.target: Live tiles and the lock screen show contextually relevant and timely info at a glance.

trans-unit.source: Push notifications bring real-time, breaking alerts to your user’s attention when they're needed.
trans-unit.target: Push notifications bring real-time, breaking alerts to your user’s attention when they're needed.

trans-unit.source: The Action Center is a place where you can organize and display notifications and content that users need to take action on.
trans-unit.target: The Action Center is a place where you can organize and display notifications and content that users need to take action on.

trans-unit.source: Background execution and triggers bring your app to life just when the user needs it.
trans-unit.target: Background execution and triggers bring your app to life just when the user needs it.

trans-unit.source: Your app can use voice and Bluetooth LE devices to help users interact with the world around them.
trans-unit.target: Your app can use voice and Bluetooth LE devices to help users interact with the world around them.

trans-unit.source: Finally, you can use roaming data and the Windows Credential Locker to enable a consistent roaming experience across all of the Windows screens where users run your app.
trans-unit.target: Finally, you can use roaming data and the Windows Credential Locker to enable a consistent roaming experience across all of the Windows screens where users run your app.

trans-unit.source: Roaming data gives you an easy way to store a user’s preferences and settings in the cloud, without having to build your own sync infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Roaming data gives you an easy way to store a user’s preferences and settings in the cloud, without having to build your own sync infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: And you can store user credentials in the Credential Locker, where security and reliability are the top priority.
trans-unit.target: And you can store user credentials in the Credential Locker, where security and reliability are the top priority.

trans-unit.source: Monetize your app your way
trans-unit.target: Monetize your app your way

trans-unit.source: On Windows, you can choose how you'll monetize your app—across phones, tablets, PCs, and other devices.
trans-unit.target: On Windows, you can choose how you'll monetize your app—across phones, tablets, PCs, and other devices.

trans-unit.source: We give you a number of ways to make money with your app and the services it delivers.
trans-unit.target: We give you a number of ways to make money with your app and the services it delivers.

trans-unit.source: All you need to do is choose the one that works best for you:
trans-unit.target: All you need to do is choose the one that works best for you:

trans-unit.source: A paid download is the simplest option.
trans-unit.target: A paid download is the simplest option.

trans-unit.source: Just name your price.
trans-unit.target: Just name your price.

trans-unit.source: Trials give you a great way to let users try your app before buying it, providing easier discoverability and conversion than the more traditional "freemium" options.
trans-unit.target: Trials give you a great way to let users try your app before buying it, providing easier discoverability and conversion than the more traditional "freemium" options.

trans-unit.source: In-app purchase offers you the most flexibility for monetizing your app.
trans-unit.target: In-app purchase offers you the most flexibility for monetizing your app.

trans-unit.source: Let's get started
trans-unit.target: Let's get started

trans-unit.source: For a more detailed look at the UWP, read the [Guide to Universal Windows Platform apps](universal-application-platform-guide.md).
trans-unit.target: For a more detailed look at the UWP, read the [Guide to Universal Windows Platform apps](universal-application-platform-guide.md).

trans-unit.source: Then, check out [Get set up](get-set-up.md) to download the tools you need to start creating apps.
trans-unit.target: Then, check out [Get set up](get-set-up.md) to download the tools you need to start creating apps.

trans-unit.source: Related topics
trans-unit.target: Related topics

trans-unit.target: Guide to Universal Windows Platform apps

trans-unit.target: Get set up
